title: I am done watching worlds
body:
Why watching worlds again? SKT is going to win again and you will see 3 series of SKT skins... they even were smug and bored about it all the time. Whats the point anymore? Do you really think H2K or Samsung stand a chance?

Fuck esports I am tired of watching the same team win over and over again and being all "playing with non koreans is a waste of time" attitude and in the end proving that there is no point for other regions other than korea to exist for esports.

replies.body:
You say this like it's some big conspiracy.

No one is kept out from competing in Worlds; teams from Korea tend to view what they do more seriously.  It's a regional thing.

It's great fun to see amazing plays; while it might be disappointing for you, these guys ARE still the best in the world, and watching people who can play this game the way they can is always fantastic.

I'm not really sure what your issue is - someone is too good and keeps annihilating all competition?

It's almost like a lot of viewers generate a predetermined mindset based on the outcome of each series as the tournament goes on.

Viewers tend to take a moment to look at the upcoming matchup. They'll place their minds on a particular expectation whether the team they hope to win actually does or not. And finally, write out thoughts based on the outcome. both logical and/or irrational. What if ROX won? What would be the reaction? A blame game? Commendation?

This feels like TSM/RNG case where a decent portion of the community is wanting to cushion the blow taken at the realization that it's "this particular case" happening yet again. This happens all over esports; not just here and not always involving Korea.

Personally I'm indifferent far more than anything. I don't see it as "Oh god SKT won again I'm sick of this." I see it as "This Worlds has delivered beyond what I expected" and it just makes me look forward to what the next match/competition will shape out to be.

But the thing is that people don't want to see the same team wins Worlds every single year. Not only it will suck the joy out of watching Worlds, it also becomes pointless in even watching Worlds because we all know who's going to win.

If SKT wins again next year and perhaps the year after that, then there's no point.

Even Riot doesn't want to make more SKT skins.

People wanted more variety in winning Worlds, not seeing the same team win year after year. It's tiring, and sooner or later, people are going to get sick of it.

Variety comes from competition; I don't understand why you're angry at SKT for being the best.  Should they not play to their strengths?

You forget that this is a career for some people.  No one cares about your need for "variety".

yeah i probally wont even bother watching the finals myself this year. Same thing over and over is kind of dumb... some people are just a little....slower.... on the uptake and stay amused by seeing the same thing over and over for longer. There is a reason DOTA has so many more viewers for its worlds in porportion to its population... because its not the same thing, over and over. I dont care about the fact that its korea, so much as the fact that it's the same team 3 times in a row almost, only skipping out season 4. Even if it was na, or EU winning 24/7 i wouldnt watch it because whats the point honestly you already know who is going to win, and more or less how they are going to win. A year or so ago i would sit there and watch all the matches and what not. Now i just sorta have it on in the back ground while i play games or do other things... really isnt nearly as intresting as anything from season 4 or earlier
I hear ya but there's nothing you can really except hope that the other teams improve and perform better next year.
Do you think its really called "worlds" if a team goes undefeated during the whole tournament like last years?

Yes because everyone in the world is able to compete with it.
Just because the a team keeps winning doesn't detract from the fact that the competition is a world-wide one.
Your problem is literally "I hate that these guys are good, they should stop being good."

That's a stawman and a half.  His argument is the competition is boring if the same team wins everytime.  He's not saying SKT should stop being good, he's saying it's boring that no one else outside of Korea is even putting up a fight against them.  

Feel free to disagree, but it is kind of lame that the last 3 years in a row most people predicted the number 1 korean team to win and they did, and this year a lot of people thought SKT would win and they probably will.  I'm happy as long as the games are fun to watch, but I can't blame people for being bored/disappointed by watching the same team win 3/4 worlds, with the 2015 champion likely facing the 2014 champion in the final.  People who are NA LCS fans put a lot of hope in NA teams making it out of groups and TSM going far so they are bound to be disappointed to see  no representatives in the semis, and last years korean champs likely winning another trophy and a 3rd set of skins.
Stay salty, my friend.
